description.@en: For every step they take, and every move they make, their body begins to rot away.

data.distance: Any one person you can see

criticalFailure.@en: Your legs suddenly give way beneath you as you crumble into a heap onto the ground. You are immediately made Helpless, but can Resist with a successful Toughness Test at the beginning of each of your Turns for the Duration of the spell to escape its Effects.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but your foe is also left Helpless whenever they suffer a Grievous Injury.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the foe you can see must Resist with a successful Toughness Test or be made Gouty. While Gouty, as a foe ends their Turn, they must roll a number of [[/roll D6]] Chaos Dice equal to the number of AP they spent on Movement Actions. If one Chaos Die results in face ‘6’, they suffer a Moderate Injury. If two Chaos Dice result in face ‘6’, they suffer a Serious Injury. If three or more Chaos Dice result in face ‘6’, they suffer a Grievous Injury. When this Magick inflicts a Moderate Injury, it is always a Twisted Ankle. When it inflicts a Serious Injury, it is always a Stress Fracture. Finally, when it inflicts a Grievous Injury, it is always a Maimed Foot.

reagents.@en: A cured leg muscle from your own Ancestry, tied into a knot (expended)
